summary: Adds a Miniature Dragon Follower to accompany you in your travels
descriptionHtml:
Briinah, Meaning "Sister" in the Dragon Tongue, is a Miniature Dragon that can be recruited to follow you about Tamriel.

As she is such a small dragon, her flight is not yet developed, and thus she travels on the ground behind you.

Briinah possesses the ability to use shouts, as all dragons do, and will use them to aid you in combat.

She carries a flute that may be used to magically grant her flight, but the magic isn't always perfect. This flute may also take away her flight, should it be so desired.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Briinah is finished to the best of my ability. As my first Skyrim Creation Kit project, she may not be perfect, but she is functional.

She can be found at the main top the Whiterun Watchtower, sitting on the edge. Watch out for Dragons!

Keep in mind, since Dragons are not meant to be actual followers, some scripts may break. In these cases it's best to reload the most recent save. Briinah is [u][i][b]Fully functional[/b][/i][/u] in combat.

I give permission for anyone to modify this mod to fit their likes, but they may NOT upload the changes.
DO NOT reupload this file anywhere else, without explicit permission from me.

My Other Mods:
Marrik, The Ghost Thief: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79733/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79733/?
[/url]Lilitha, The Ghost Mage: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79734/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79734/?
[/url]Phydra, The Dawnguard Ghost: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79794/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79794/?[/url]

Credits: Me, for making the mod.
Bethesda, for making Skyrim, and providing the Creation Kit
Darkfox127, for his Creature Companion Tutorial
